Famous Personalities.name: Echoes of the Past
Famous Personalities.description: Test your knowledge of historical figures and pivotal moments in this quiz. From Hollywood legends to infamous leaders, see how well you remember the people who shaped our world.

questions.text: Who is the star of the movie 'Casablanca'?
In 1960, Nazi official Adolph Eichmann was finally captured in what country?
Who was president of the United States when Bill Clinton was born?
Who is an archenemy of the cartoon superhero Underdog?
After Prince Charles, who is next in line to be the king of England?

Famous Personalities.name: Faces of Influence
Famous Personalities.description: Delve into the lives of influential figures across various fields. This quiz explores leaders, activists, and innovators who left an indelible mark on society.

questions.text: Gerry Adams is the president of what organization?
Whose profile can you see on the front of dimes that are currently in circulation?
Who kills Tony at the end of the film 'West Side Story'?
Who was on the $500 bill?
Who was the English king at the time of the American Revolution?

Famous Personalities.name: Creative Minds
Famous Personalities.description: Explore the world of artists, writers, and innovators who have shaped our culture. This quiz celebrates the individuals who pushed boundaries and inspired generations.

questions.text: Who co-founded Microsoft with Bill Gates?
Which Pope immediately preceded John Paul II?
Which of these Democrats lost to Ronald Reagan in the 1984 presidential elections?
Who is the creator of the comic strip 'The Far Side'?
What was Richard Nixon's middle name?

Famous Personalities.name: American Icons
Famous Personalities.description: Discover the stories behind some of America's most recognizable figures. From entertainment to politics, this quiz explores the individuals who defined a nation.

questions.text: Which of these evangelists is a cousin of rocker Jerry Lee Lewis?
Who was the longest reigning monarch in French history?
Who is the star of the TV show 'Everybody Loves Raymond'?

Famous Personalities.name: Voices of Change
Famous Personalities.description: Learn about the individuals who fought for justice and equality. This quiz celebrates the activists, leaders, and reformers who shaped the course of history.

questions.text: Who was the first US president to resign from that office?
Who originally proposed the idea of daylight-saving time?
What was the birth name of civil rights leader Malcolm X?

Famous Personalities.name: Beyond the Headlines
Famous Personalities.description: Go beyond the surface and uncover fascinating details about well-known personalities. This quiz explores lesser-known facts and intriguing stories.

questions.text: Who is the twin sister of 'Dear Abby' columnist Abigail VanBuren?
What Native American tribe did chief Crazy Horse lead?
Which of these famous baseball figures was once acquitted at court-martial for insubordination?
Which of these fashion designers was born in the United States?
Which of these actors did one-handed push-ups on stage at the 1992 Academy Awards?

Famous Personalities.name: Trailblazers & Legends
Famous Personalities.description: Celebrate the individuals who broke barriers and achieved greatness. This quiz explores the lives of pioneers, innovators, and extraordinary achievers.

questions.text: Who was the first First Lady to run for political office?
Who is the patron saint of animals?
Who was the WNBA's Most Valuable Player of 1999?
Who led the 1831 slave insurrection in Southampton, Virginia?
Who was Charlie McCarthy?

Famous Personalities.name: Global Figures
Famous Personalities.description: Test your knowledge of influential figures from around the world. This quiz explores leaders, artists, and innovators who have shaped global history.

questions.text: Which one of these world leaders was assassinated?

Who is the star of the movie 'Casablanca'?
